text: Yinci, tamen de zhu [an la] yingdale tamen [de qiqiu bing shuo]:“Wo jue bu shi nimen zhong renhe xingshan zhe de shangong tulao [zhu], wulun shi nan shi nu, nimen yibufen laizi ling yibufen. Fan qianyi zhe, bei zhu chu jiayuan zhe, wei wo de dao shou pohai zhe, zhandou zhe he zhenwang zhe, wo biding shemian tamen de zuiguo, biding rang tamen jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. Zhe shi cong an la jiang shi de baochou. Zai an la nali hai you zuimei de baochou.”
